languages.text: "Тот, кому приходится принимать непростые решения, часто становится врагом в глазах подчиненных. Я понимаю".
"Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."
languages.original_text: "Тот, кому приходится принимать непростые решения, часто становится врагом в глазах подчиненных. Я понимаю".

traits.locale_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."
"Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."
"Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."
"Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

languages.text: “做出艰难的选择，往往意味着成为下属眼中的敌人。我能理解。”
languages.original_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

traits.locale_text: “做出艰难的选择，往往意味着成为下属眼中的敌人。我能理解。”

languages.text: «Tomar decisiones difíciles a menudo le convierte a un{mf|o|a} en el enemigo de sus subordinados. Lo entiendo».
languages.original_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

traits.locale_text: «Tomar decisiones difíciles a menudo le convierte a un{mf|o|a} en el enemigo de sus subordinados. Lo entiendo».

languages.text: 「難しい選択をすることは、部下から見れば敵になることを意味する。私はわかっているつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

traits.locale_text: 「難しい選択をすることは、部下から見れば敵になることを意味する。私はわかっているつもりだ」

languages.text: "Wenn man schwere Entscheidungen trifft, wird man in den Augen seiner Untergebenen oft zum Feind. Ich verstehe das."
languages.original_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man schwere Entscheidungen trifft, wird man in den Augen seiner Untergebenen oft zum Feind. Ich verstehe das."

languages.text: « Les décisions difficiles qu'il nous faut prendre font souvent de nous des ennemis aux yeux de nos subordonnés. Je comprends. »
languages.original_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

traits.locale_text: « Les décisions difficiles qu'il nous faut prendre font souvent de nous des ennemis aux yeux de nos subordonnés. Je comprends. »

languages.text: "Zor seçimler yapmak, çoğu zaman astlarının gözünde düşman olmak demektir. Anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Making hard choices often means becoming the enemy in the eyes of one's subordinates. I understand."

traits.locale_text: "Zor seçimler yapmak, çoğu zaman astlarının gözünde düşman olmak demektir. Anlıyorum."
